title: Rouded square sans similar to Eurostile
content:
I'm trying to figure out what typeface this is and thought it may be [Eurostile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419141300/http:/myfonts.us/td-88I7Jh) but that doesn't quite seem to fit. Perhaps it's a squooshed version of it. Any other ideas?

Font: 

 H&Co Vitesse Sans
